author: Reuters Editorial
title: South African court dismisses bid to block $4.7 billion renewable energy deals
text:
JOHANNESBURG (Reuters) - A South African court on Thursday dismissed a legal bid to block the signing of $4.7 billion in renewable energy deals, a spokeswoman for the Department of Energy told Reuters.
The last-minute legal challenge was lodged earlier this month by the National Union of Metalworkers (NUMSA) and Transform RSA, a group which has lobbied for ousted president Jacob Zuma in the past.
Reporting by Alexander Winning; Editing by Olivia Kumwenda-Mtambo
